name: api_get_dns_records
description: Gets the DNS records associated with given Domain ID

function.name: api_get_dns_records
function.desc: Gets the DNS records associated with given Domain ID

sid.name: sid
sid.description: the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call

domain_id.name: domain_id
domain_id.description: The ID of the domain in question.

output.name: domain_id
output.description: The ID of the domain in question.

output.name: type
output.description: Coupon Type, 1: Percentage Off   2: Fixed Amount Off  3: Specified Sale Price

input_comment:
* @param sid string the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call
* @param domain_id int The ID of the domain in question.
